example_sentence: 我正在吃一个苹果。(Wǒ zhèngzài chī yīgè píngguǒ.) - I am eating an apple.
她正在吃一根香蕉。(Tā zhèngzài chī yī gēn xiāngjiāo.) - She is eating a banana.
这个芒果很甜。(Zhège mángguǒ hěn tián.) - This mango is very sweet.
木瓜对身体很好。(Mùguā duì shēntǐ hěn hǎo.) - Papaya is very good for the body.
我很喜欢吃西瓜。(Wǒ hěn xǐhuān chī xīguā.) - I really like eating watermelon.
这菠萝非常新鲜。(Zhè bōluó fēicháng xīnxiān.) - This pineapple is very fresh.
草莓很甜。(Cǎoméi hěn tián.) - The strawberry is very sweet.
我喜欢喝橙汁。(Wǒ xǐhuān hē chéng zhī.) - I like drinking orange juice.
葡萄很酸。(Pútáo hěn suān.) - The grapes are sour.
樱桃非常美味。(Yīngtáo fēicháng měiwèi.) - Cherries are very delicious.
我喜欢吃炸土豆。(Wǒ xǐhuān chī zhà tǔdòu.) - I like eating fried potatoes.
番茄很好吃。(Fānqié hěn hǎochī.) - The tomato is very tasty.
他加了很多胡椒。(Tā jiāle hěn duō hújiāo.) - He added a lot of pepper.
黄瓜很清脆。(Huángguā hěn qīngcuì.) - The cucumber is very crunchy.
洋葱让我流泪。(Yángcōng ràng wǒ liúlèi.) - The onion makes me cry.
菠菜富含铁。(Bōcài fùhán tiě.) - Spinach is rich in iron.
茄子是我的最爱。(Qiézi shì wǒ de zuì'ài.) - Eggplant is my favorite.
我喜欢吃胡萝卜。(Wǒ xǐhuān chī húluóbo.) - I like eating carrots.
菜花非常健康。(Càihuā fēicháng jiànkāng.) - Cauliflower is very healthy.
竹笋是春季的美食。(Zhúsǔn shì chūnjì de měishí.) - Bamboo shoots are a spring delicacy.
我喜欢吃鸡肉。(Wǒ xǐhuān chī jīròu.) - I like eating chicken.
牛肉很嫩。(Niúròu hěn nèn.) - The beef is very tender.
羊肉在冬天非常受欢迎。(Yángròu zài dōngtiān fēicháng shòu huānyíng.) - Mutton is very popular in winter.
猪肉是常见的肉类。(Zhūròu shì chángjiàn de ròu lèi.) - Pork is a common type of meat.
我喜欢吃鱼肉。(Wǒ xǐhuān chī yúròu.) - I like eating fish.
鸭肉很美味。(Yāròu hěn měiwèi.) - Duck meat is delicious.
鹅肉在节日期间很受欢迎。(Éròu zài jiérì qījiān hěn shòu huānyíng.) - Goose is very popular during holidays.
兔肉是一个不常见的选择。(Tùròu shì yīgè bù chángjiàn de xuǎnzé.) - Rabbit meat is an uncommon choice.
牛舌是一道传统菜肴。(Niúshé shì yī dào chuántǒng càiyáo.) - Beef tongue is a traditional dish.
猪肝富含铁。(Zhūgān fùhán tiě.) - Pork liver is rich in iron.
我渴了，我想喝水。(Wǒ kě le, wǒ xiǎng hē shuǐ.) - I'm thirsty, I want to drink water.
中国人每天都喝茶。(Zhōngguó rén měitiān dōu hē chá.) - Chinese people drink tea every day.
我早上喝一杯咖啡。(Wǒ zǎoshang hē yī bēi kāfēi.) - I drink a cup of coffee in the morning.
我喜欢喝橙汁。(Wǒ xǐhuān hē chéngzhī.) - I like drinking orange juice.
小孩子通常喜欢喝牛奶。(Xiǎo háizi tōngcháng xǐhuān hē niúnǎi.) - Little kids usually like drinking milk.
我不喜欢喝汽水。(Wǒ bù xǐhuān hē qìshuǐ.) - I don't like drinking soda.
我和朋友们一起喝啤酒。(Wǒ hé péngyǒu men yīqǐ hē píjiǔ.) - I drink beer with my friends.
她喜欢喝红葡萄酒。(Tā xǐhuān hē hóng pútáojiǔ.) - She likes drinking red wine.
我买了一瓶饮料。(Wǒ mǎile yī píng yǐnliào.) - I bought a bottle of beverage.
冬天喝热巧克力很好。(Dōngtiān hē rè qiǎokèlì hěn hǎo.) - Drinking hot chocolate in winter is great.
我喜欢踢足球。(Wǒ xǐhuān tī zúqiú.) - I like playing soccer.
他每天都打篮球。(Tā měitiān dōu dǎ lánqiú.) - He plays basketball every day.
她在周末打网球。(Tā zài zhōumò dǎ wǎngqiú.) - She plays tennis on weekends.
我喜欢在海里游泳。(Wǒ xǐhuān zài hǎi lǐ yóuyǒng.) - I like swimming in the sea.
他们在学校打乒乓球。(Tāmen zài xuéxiào dǎ pīngpāng qiú.) - They play table tennis at school.
我们经常一起打羽毛球。(Wǒmen jīngcháng yīqǐ dǎ yǔmáoqiú.) - We often play badminton together.
他正在训练拳击。(Tā zhèngzài xùnliàn quánjī.) - He is training for boxing.
我们在沙滩上打排球。(Wǒmen zài shātān shàng dǎ páiqiú.) - We play volleyball on the beach.
我喜欢打高尔夫球。(Wǒ xǐhuān dǎ gāo'ěrfū qiú.) - I like playing golf.
每天早上我都跑步。(Měitiān zǎoshang wǒ dōu pǎobù.) - I run every morning.
我有一辆汽车。(Wǒ yǒu yī liàng qìchē.) - I have a car.
我每天骑自行车上班。(Wǒ měitiān qí zìxíngchē shàngbān.) - I ride a bicycle to work every day.
他骑摩托车上学。(Tā qí mótuōchē shàngxué.) - He rides a motorcycle to school.
我每天坐公交车上班。(Wǒ měitiān zuò gōngjiāo chē shàngbān.) - I take the bus to work every day.
我们坐火车去旅行。(Wǒmen zuò huǒchē qù lǚxíng.) - We take the train to travel.
我明天要坐飞机去北京。(Wǒ míngtiān yào zuò fēijī qù Běijīng.) - I will take a plane to Beijing tomorrow.
这艘船很大。(Zhè sōu chuán hěn dà.) - This ship is very large.
今天我穿了新衣服。(Jīntiān wǒ chuānle xīn yīfu.) - I wore new clothes today.
我买了一条新的裤子。(Wǒ mǎile yītiáo xīn de kùzi.) - I bought a new pair of pants.
他穿了一件白色衬衫。(Tā chuānle yī jiàn báisè chènshān.) - He wore a white shirt.
她今天穿了一条红色的裙子。(Tā jīntiān chuānle yītiáo hóngsè de qúnzi.) - She wore a red skirt today.
外面很冷，我需要穿外套。(Wàimiàn hěn lěng, wǒ xūyào chuān wàitào.) - It's very cold outside, I need to wear a coat.
她穿了一双新的鞋子。(Tā chuānle yī shuāng xīn de xiézi.) - She wore a new pair of shoes.
他戴了一顶红色的帽子。(Tā dài le yī dǐng hóngsè de màozi.) - He wore a red hat.
冬天时，我喜欢戴手套。(Dōngtiān shí, wǒ xǐhuān dài shǒutào.) - I like wearing gloves in winter.
他戴了一条蓝色的领带。(Tā dài le yī tiáo lánsè de lǐngdài.) - He wore a blue tie.
我找不到我的袜子。(Wǒ zhǎo bù dào wǒ de wàzi.) - I can't find my socks.
我的父亲很勤劳。(Wǒ de fùqīn hěn qínláo.) - My father is very hardworking.
我的母亲是老师。(Wǒ de mǔqīn shì lǎoshī.) - My mother is a teacher.
我的哥哥很高。(Wǒ de gēge hěn gāo.) - My older brother is tall.
她是我的妹妹。(Tā shì wǒ de mèimei.) - She is my younger sister.
我的姐姐喜欢唱歌。(Wǒ de jiějie xǐhuān chànggē.) - My older sister likes singing.
弟弟很喜欢玩游戏。(Dìdi hěn xǐhuān wán yóuxì.) - My younger brother likes playing games.
我的爷爷住在乡下。(Wǒ de yéye zhù zài xiāngxià.) - My grandfather lives in the countryside.
奶奶做的饭很好吃。(Nǎinai zuò de fàn hěn hǎo chī.) - My grandmother's cooking is delicious.
外公喜欢钓鱼。(Wàigōng xǐhuān diàoyú.) - My grandfather likes fishing.
外婆每天都给我打电话。(Wàipó měitiān dōu gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà.) - My grandmother calls me every day.
我们去爬山吧。(Wǒmen qù pá shān ba.) - Let's go climb the mountain.
这条河很长。(Zhè tiáo hé hěn cháng.) - This river is very long.
公园里有很多大树。(Gōngyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō dà shù.) - There are many big trees in the park.
春天的时候花开得很漂亮。(Chūntiān de shíhòu huā kāi de hěn piàoliang.) - Flowers bloom beautifully in spring.
今天的天空很蓝。(Jīntiān de tiānkōng hěn lán.) - The sky is very blue today.
我喜欢在海边散步。(Wǒ xǐhuān zài hǎibiān sànbù.) - I like walking by the sea.
下雨了，我们该带伞。(Xià yǔ le, wǒmen gāi dài sǎn.) - It's raining, we should take an umbrella.
今天的风很大。(Jīntiān de fēng hěn dà.) - The wind is very strong today.
动物园里有很多动物。(Dòngwùyuán lǐ yǒu hěn duō dòngwù.) - There are many animals in the zoo.
夜晚，天空中有很多星星。(Yèwǎn, tiānkōng zhōng yǒu hěn duō xīngxīng.) - At night, there are many stars in the sky.
她是我的好朋友。(Tā shì wǒ de hǎo péngyǒu.) - She is my good friend.
我的爱人非常体贴。(Wǒ de àirén fēicháng tǐtiē.) - My spouse is very considerate.
她的男朋友很帅。(Tā de nán péngyǒu hěn shuài.) - Her boyfriend is handsome.
我和女朋友一起去旅行。(Wǒ hé nǚ péngyǒu yīqǐ qù lǚxíng.) - I am going on a trip with my girlfriend.
他是我的兄弟。(Tā shì wǒ de xiōngdì.) - He is my brother.
我们是好姐妹。(Wǒmen shì hǎo jiěmèi.) - We are good sisters.
我的父母住在北京。(Wǒ de fùmǔ zhù zài Běijīng.) - My parents live in Beijing.
他们有两个子女。(Tāmen yǒu liǎng gè zǐnǚ.) - They have two children.
他们是一对幸福的夫妻。(Tāmen shì yī duì xìngfú de fūqī.) - They are a happy couple.
我们的邻居很友好。(Wǒmen de línjū hěn yǒuhǎo.) - Our neighbor is very friendly.
我每天都去学校。(Wǒ měitiān dōu qù xuéxiào.) - I go to school every day.
她去医院看病。(Tā qù yīyuàn kànbìng.) - She went to the hospital to see a doctor.
我们去商店买东西。(Wǒmen qù shāngdiàn mǎi dōngxī.) - We go to the store to buy things.
周末我喜欢去公园散步。(Zhōumò wǒ xǐhuān qù gōngyuán sànbù.) - I like to take a walk in the park on weekends.
我们在餐厅吃晚餐。(Wǒmen zài cāntīng chī wǎncān.) - We have dinner at the restaurant.
我在图书馆看书。(Wǒ zài túshūguǎn kànshū.) - I read books in the library.
我去超市买了些水果。(Wǒ qù chāoshì mǎile xiē shuǐguǒ.) - I went to the supermarket and bought some fruit.
我们要去机场接他。(Wǒmen yào qù jīchǎng jiē tā.) - We are going to the airport to pick him up.
我们去电影院看电影。(Wǒmen qù diànyǐngyuàn kàn diànyǐng.) - We are going to the cinema to watch a movie.
夏天我们常常去海滩游泳。(Xiàtiān wǒmen chángcháng qù hǎitān yóuyǒng.) - We often go to the beach to swim in summer.
今天我很快乐。(Jīntiān wǒ hěn kuàilè.) - I am very happy today.
她因为失去朋友而感到悲伤。(Tā yīnwèi shīqù péngyǒu ér gǎndào bēishāng.) - She felt sad because she lost her friend.
他因为迟到而生气。(Tā yīnwèi chídào ér shēngqì.) - He got angry because he was late.
我对明天的旅行感到很兴奋。(Wǒ duì míngtiān de lǚxíng gǎndào hěn xīngfèn.) - I am very excited about the trip tomorrow.
他害怕黑暗。(Tā hàipà hēi'àn.) - He is afraid of the dark.
我在考试前总是感到很紧张。(Wǒ zài kǎoshì qián zǒng shì gǎndào hěn jǐnzhāng.) - I always feel nervous before exams.
她在演讲时非常自信。(Tā zài yǎnjiǎng shí fēicháng zìxìn.) - She is very confident when giving a speech.
他对自己的行为感到羞愧。(Tā duì zìjǐ de xíngwéi gǎndào xiūkuì.) - He feels ashamed of his behavior.
度假时我感到很放松。(Dùjià shí wǒ gǎndào hěn fàngsōng.) - I feel very relaxed during my vacation.
我对他的决定感到惊讶。(Wǒ duì tā de juédìng gǎndào jīngyà.) - I was surprised by his decision.
她是一个非常优秀的医生。(Tā shì yīgè fēicháng yōuxiù de yīshēng.) - She is an excellent doctor.
他是一名中学教师。(Tā shì yī míng zhōngxué jiàoshī.) - He is a middle school teacher.
我正在成为一名软件工程师。(Wǒ zhèngzài chéngwéi yī míng ruǎnjiàn gōngchéngshī.) - I am becoming a software engineer.
他是一位非常成功的律师。(Tā shì yī wèi fēicháng chénggōng de lǜshī.) - He is a very successful lawyer.
护士们在医院里照顾病人。(Hùshìmen zài yīyuàn lǐ zhàogù bìngrén.) - The nurses take care of patients in the hospital.
这家餐厅的厨师非常有名。(Zhè jiā cāntīng de chúshī fēicháng yǒumíng.) - The chef at this restaurant is very famous.
他是一位资深的记者。(Tā shì yī wèi zīshēn de jìzhě.) - He is a seasoned journalist.
我是一名出租车司机。(Wǒ shì yī míng chūzūchē sījī.) - I am a taxi driver.
她是一个著名的演员。(Tā shì yīgè zhùmíng de yǎnyuán.) - She is a famous actress.
他是一位杰出的科学家。(Tā shì yī wèi jiéchū de kēxuéjiā.) - He is an outstanding scientist.
我每天都去学校。(Wǒ měitiān dōu qù xuéxiào.) - I go to school every day.
她正在申请大学。(Tā zhèngzài shēnqǐng dàxué.) - She is applying for university.
我的老师非常友好。(Wǒ de lǎoshī fēicháng yǒuhǎo.) - My teacher is very friendly.
他是一个努力学习的学生。(Tā shì yīgè nǔlì xuéxí de xuéshēng.) - He is a hardworking student.
我正在选修一门历史课程。(Wǒ zhèngzài xuǎnxiū yī mén lìshǐ kèchéng.) - I am taking a history course.
明天有一个数学考试。(Míngtiān yǒu yīgè shùxué kǎoshì.) - There is a math exam tomorrow.
我在图书馆借书。(Wǒ zài túshūguǎn jiè shū.) - I borrow books from the library.
我今天有很多作业。(Wǒ jīntiān yǒu hěn duō zuòyè.) - I have a lot of homework today.
我们这个学期有五门课。(Wǒmen zhège xuéqī yǒu wǔmén kè.) - We have five courses this semester.
他获得了硕士学位。(Tā huòdé le shuòshì xuéwèi.) - He earned a master's degree.
我们今天的课堂很有趣。(Wǒmen jīntiān de kètáng hěn yǒuqù.) - Today's class is very interesting.
我参加了一个关于历史的讲座。(Wǒ cānjiāle yīgè guānyú lìshǐ de jiǎngzuò.) - I attended a lecture on history.
数学是我最喜欢的学科。(Shùxué shì wǒ zuì xǐhuān de xuékē.) - Math is my favorite subject.
我的考试成绩很不错。(Wǒ de kǎoshì chéngjī hěn bùcuò.) - My exam grades are quite good.
我将在今年毕业。(Wǒ jiàng zài jīnnián bìyè.) - I will graduate this year.
这项技术正在改变我们的生活。(Zhè xiàng jìshù zhèngzài gǎibiàn wǒmen de shēnghuó.) - This technology is changing our lives.
我用电脑工作。(Wǒ yòng diànnǎo gōngzuò.) - I work using a computer.
我们通过互联网获取信息。(Wǒmen tōngguò hùliánwǎng huòqǔ xìnxī.) - We get information through the internet.
我用手机拍照。(Wǒ yòng shǒujī pāizhào.) - I take pictures with my phone.
我下载了一个新的应用程序。(Wǒ xiàzài le yīgè xīn de yìngyòng chéngxù.) - I downloaded a new app.
我正在学习编程软件。(Wǒ zhèngzài xuéxí biānchéng ruǎnjiàn.) - I am learning programming software.
这台电脑的硬件很先进。(Zhè tái diànnǎo de yìngjiàn hěn xiānjìn.) - The hardware of this computer is very advanced.
机器人正在为我们工作。(Jīqìrén zhèngzài wèi wǒmen gōngzuò.) - The robot is working for us.
人工智能正在快速发展。(Réngōng zhìnéng zhèngzài kuàisù fāzhǎn.) - Artificial intelligence is developing rapidly.
我们需要收集更多的数据。(Wǒmen xūyào shōují gèng duō de shùjù.) - We need to collect more data.
云计算正在改变商业模式。(Yún jìsuàn zhèngzài gǎibiàn shāngyè móshì.) - Cloud computing is changing business models.
我们需要加强网络安全。(Wǒmen xūyào jiāqiáng wǎngluò ānquán.) - We need to strengthen cybersecurity.
虚拟现实技术使游戏更加真实。(Xūnǐ xiànshí jìshù shǐ yóuxì gèng jiā zhēnshí.) - Virtual reality technology makes games more realistic.
区块链技术具有巨大的潜力。(Qūkuài liàn jìshù jùyǒu jùdà de qiánlì.) - Blockchain technology has enormous potential.
3D打印正在改变制造行业。(3D dǎyìn zhèngzài gǎibiàn zhìzào hángyè.) - 3D printing is changing the manufacturing industry.
编程是开发软件的基础。(Biānchéng shì kāifā ruǎnjiàn de jīchǔ.) - Programming is the foundation of software development.
代码编写是软件开发的核心部分。(Dàimǎ biānxiě shì ruǎnjiàn kāifā de héxīn bùfen.) - Writing code is the core part of software development.
这个函数接受两个参数。(Zhège hánshù jiēshòu liǎng gè cānshù.) - This function takes two parameters.
我们使用变量存储数据。(Wǒmen shǐyòng biànliàng cúnchǔ shùjù.) - We use variables to store data.
常量的值在程序中不能改变。(Chángliàng de zhí zài chéngxù zhōng bùnéng gǎibiàn.) - The value of a constant cannot be changed in the program.
这个数组包含10个元素。(Zhège shùzǔ bāohán 10 gè yuánsù.) - This array contains 10 elements.
链表是由节点组成的数据结构。(Liànbiǎo shì yóu jiédiǎn zǔchéng de shùjù jiégòu.) - A linked list is a data structure composed of nodes.
栈是一种先进后出的数据结构。(Zhàn shì yī zhǒng xiānjìn hòu chū de shùjù jiégòu.) - A stack is a data structure that follows the LIFO (Last In First Out) principle.
队列是一种先进先出的数据结构。(Duìliè shì yī zhǒng xiānjìn xiān chū de shùjù jiégòu.) - A queue is a data structure that follows the FIFO (First In First Out) principle.
哈希表用于高效地查找元素。(Hāxī biǎo yòng yú gāoxiào de cházhǎo yuánsù.) - A hash table is used for efficient element lookup.
我们使用快速排序算法来排序数据。(Wǒmen shǐyòng kuàisù páixù suànfǎ lái páixù shùjù.) - We use the quicksort algorithm to sort data.
二分查找是查找元素的高效方法。(Èr fēn cházhǎo shì cházhǎo yuánsù de gāoxiào fāngfǎ.) - Binary search is an efficient method to search for elements.
递归是一个常见的编程技巧。(Dìguī shì yīgè chángjiàn de biānchéng jìqiǎo.) - Recursion is a common programming technique.
动态编程用于解决最优子结构问题。(Dòngtài biānchéng yòng yú jiějué zuì yōu zǐ jiégòu wèntí.) - Dynamic programming is used to solve problems with optimal substructure.
并发编程可以让多个任务同时执行。(Bìngfā biānchéng kěyǐ ràng duō gè rènwù tóngshí zhíxíng.) - Concurrent programming allows multiple tasks to run simultaneously.
并行计算能显著提高程序的运行速度。(Bìngxíng jìsuàn néng xiǎnzhù tígāo chéngxù de yùnxíng sùdù.) - Parallel computing can significantly improve the execution speed of programs.
面向对象编程是一种编程范式。(Miànxiàng duìxiàng biānchéng shì yī zhǒng biānchéng fànshì.) - Object-oriented programming is a programming paradigm.
我们用类来创建对象。(Wǒmen yòng lèi lái chuàngjiàn duìxiàng.) - We use classes to create objects.
对象是类的实例。(Duìxiàng shì lèi de shílì.) - An object is an instance of a class.
继承是面向对象编程的一个重要特性。(Jìchéng shì miànxiàng duìxiàng biānchéng de yīgè zhòngyào tèxìng.) - Inheritance is an important feature of object-oriented programming.
多态允许同一方法在不同对象上表现不同的行为。(Duōtài yǔnxǔ tóng yī fāngfǎ zài bùtóng duìxiàng shàng biǎoxiàn bùtóng de xíngwéi.) - Polymorphism allows the same method to behave differently on different objects.
封装帮助隐藏对象的内部实现细节。(Fēngzhuāng bāngzhù yǐncáng duìxiàng de nèibù shíxiàn xìjié.) - Encapsulation helps hide the internal implementation details of an object.
中国是世界上人口最多的国家。(Zhōngguó shì shìjiè shàng rénkǒu zuì duō de guójiā.) - China is the most populous country in the world.
美国是一个发达国家。(Měiguó shì yīgè fādá guójiā.) - The United States is a developed country.
印度有着丰富的历史和文化。(Yìndù yǒuzhe fēngfù de lìshǐ hé wénhuà.) - India has a rich history and culture.
日本是一个高科技的国家。(Rìběn shì yīgè gāo kējì de guójiā.) - Japan is a high-tech country.
巴西是南美洲最大、最人口众多的国家。(Bāxī shì nán měi zhōu zuì dà, zuì rénkǒu zhòngduō de guójiā.) - Brazil is the largest and most populous country in South America.
法国以其文化和美食而闻名。(Fàguó yǐ qí wénhuà hé měishí ér wénmíng.) - France is famous for its culture and cuisine.
德国是世界上经济最强的国家之一。(Déguó shì shìjiè shàng jīngjì zuì qiáng de guójiā zhī yī.) - Germany is one of the strongest economies in the world.
俄罗斯是世界上面积最大的国家。(Éluósī shì shìjiè shàng miànjī zuì dà de guójiā.) - Russia is the largest country in the world by area.
加拿大是一个环境美丽的国家。(Jiānádà shì yīgè huánjìng měilì de guójiā.) - Canada is a country with a beautiful environment.
澳大利亚以其自然景观和动物而著名。(Àodàlìyà yǐ qí zìrán jǐngguān hé dòngwù ér zhùmíng.) - Australia is famous for its natural landscapes and animals.
英国的文化对全球有深远的影响。(Yīngguó de wénhuà duì quánqiú yǒu shēnyuǎn de yǐngxiǎng.) - British culture has a far-reaching influence on the world.
韩国是一个以其技术和流行文化闻名的国家。(Hánguó shì yīgè yǐ qí jìshù hé liúxíng wénhuà wénmíng de guójiā.) - South Korea is known for its technology and pop culture.
意大利的美食和艺术闻名于世界。(Yìdàlì de měishí hé yìshù wénmíng yú shìjiè.) - Italy is famous for its food and art around the world.
墨西哥是拉丁美洲的重要国家。(Mòxīgē shì Lādīng Měizhōu de zhòngyào guójiā.) - Mexico is an important country in Latin America.
埃及是拥有悠久历史和文明的国家。(Āijí shì yǒngyǒu yōujiǔ lìshǐ hé wénmíng de guójiā.) - Egypt is a country with a long history and civilization.
